subject: Track and Field
Running
Doping
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt rallied against the cold, the wind and Asafa Powell to win the 100 meters in 9.77 seconds Friday at the Van Damme Memorial track meet in Brussels.
snippet: Usain Bolt rallied against the cold, the wind and Asafa Powell to win the 100 meters in 9.77 seconds Friday at the Van Damme Memorial track meet in Brussels.
